scripts.install: npm i -g tailwindcss gulp gulp-concat gulp-clean-css gulp-uglify
scripts.link: npm link gulp gulp-concat gulp-clean-css gulp-uglify
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'changes' && git push origin main
scripts.update: picogen clean && npm run tailwindcss && gulp buildcss buildjs && picogen generate -s -f && npm run push
